title: Amazon Fire TV reorganizes its free channels for easier access in new update
description: Amazon brings its 400 free stations to one spot while also adding several more channels ranging from comedy to gaming.

title: This Samsung app turns your iPhone into a Galaxy Z Fold5 for a taste of the future
description: Samsung's app lets iOS owners see what it's like to look at an open Z Fold5, but it requires the use of a second iPhone.

title: Canon hints at retro-style EOS R mirrorless camera – here’s what we’d like to see
description: After the popular Fujifilm X-series and Nikon Z fc, will we ever see a mirrorless reimagining of a classic Canon analog camera?

title: YouTube hatches plan to protect your favorite musicians from AI copycats
description: YouTube announced a brand new program that will work with music industry professionals to ensure your favorite artists are protected from AI models.

title: This cheap outdoor 4K TV by Sylvox is just what your deck has been dreaming of
description: Fancy an outdoor TV for less than a thousand bucks? This waterproof TV has a high spec without the high price.

title: AMD’s successor to the RX 7600 could be an affordable GPU that shows Nvidia how it’s done
description: AMD is seemingly angling RDNA 4 towards what PC gamers really want – affordable and peppy graphics cards.

title: The highest mobile data users may surprise you
description: Hint: It's a small country in northeast Europe.

title: Don't expect new AirPods at the next Apple event – here’s why
description: Apple has kept quiet about whether it will be unveiling a new model of AirPods this year, but based on previous release schedules it’s not looking likely.

title: Old School RuneScape could soon get sailing as its first new skill, but only if it wins a vote
description: A lock-in poll is now live to determine whether sailing will be added to Old School RuneScape.

description: The official Tomb Raider website has been updated to suggest a new game announcement could be made soon.

description: Starfield currently being at version 1.6.35.0 has got fans optimistic for a "relatively bug-free" release.

title: Satirical indie game Luck be a Landlord banned in 13 countries by Google

title: Your biometrics may not be as safe as you think

title: Assassin's Creed tabletop RPG to include Red teaser

title: Is Bing AI helping in the fight against Google? Apparently not – and Microsoft’s in denial

description: Flaws in Veeam's backup solution were abused to steal credentials, researchers say.

title: Bungie teases new team-based sci-fi action project inspired by MOBAs, platformers, and life sims
description: Bungie has teased one of its "incubation projects," which is planned as a team-based action game set in a sci-fi fantasy universe.

title: This VPN is being abused to spread malware
description: A known Chinese threat actor is abusing Ivacy VPN's certificate to target gambling firms in Southeast Asia

description: Each game in Metal Gear Solid: Master Collection Vol. 1 reportedly opens with a disclaimer for potentially "outdated" content.

title: Charming indie Dave the Diver receives huge quality of life update
description: Dave the Diver has rolled out a Quality-of-Life update to target accessibility.

title: Twitch Streamers will soon be able to stop banned viewers from watching entirely
description: Twitch is rolling out a new feature that will let streamers ban viewers from watching their channel outright, rather than from simply posting in chat.
